document_data.name: Ludluth Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Ludluth Street''' was a road found within the city of [[Suldolphor]] in far eastern [[Calimshan]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Suldolphor}}
document_data.Location: Ludluth Street ran through northwest Suldolphor, originating in the northwest at the exterior city wall and passing southeast toward the center of the city.
document_data.Notable Locations: [[Emerald Dragon Way]] branched south from Ludluth Street's midpoint. The [[Griffonpost House Inn]] lay along the south side of Ludluth Sreet.
